Fenland Bliss

by Rachel Glombek

July 31, 2020
in Libertybelle

Mostly Drains

July 2020

What can you see

As you sit at the back of your boat

Cruising across The Fens?

I can see reeds.

Can you see beyond the reeds?

No.

What can you see

As you stand at the back of your boat

Cruising across The Fens?

I can see reeds.

What can you see beyond the reeds?

Nothing.

What can you see

As you stand on your footstool

Cruising across The Fens?

I can see reeds.

What can you see beyond the reeds?

Nothing.

What can you see

As you sit on the roof of your boat

Cruising across The Fens?

I can see reeds.

What can you see beyond the reeds?

Nothing.

What can you see

As you stand on the roof of your boat

Cruising across The Fens?

I can see reeds.

What can you see beyond the reeds?

Nothing.

Miles and miles of nothing...

Oh, hang on, wait, what's that?

What?

Oh, no, it was nothing...
